## Prerequisites {.unnumbered}

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

## Exercises 5.6

1.  Restyled pipelines are given below.

    ```{r}
    flights |>
      filter(dest == "IAH") |>
      group_by(year, month, day) |>
      summarize(
        n = n(),
        delay = mean(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE)
      ) |>
      filter(n > 10)
    ```
    
    ```{r}
    flights |>
      filter(
        carrier == "UA", 
        dest %in% c("IAH", "HOU"), 
        sched_dep_time > 0900, 
        sched_arr_time < 2000
      ) |>
      group_by(flight) |>
      summarize(
        delay = mean(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE), 
        cancelled = sum(is.na(arr_delay)), 
        n = n()
      ) |>
      filter(n > 10)
    ```
